participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: determined and resilient, striving to find focus despite recent setbacks.
participant_1.background: i love playing softball. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. my mom passed away when i was young. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.background: i speak chinese. my father is an electrician. i play ping pong. i love chocolate bars.
